name: GPS Signal Generator
system_prompt: You are assisting with the development of a GPS Signal Generator, a Rust-based software for GNSS signal generation that can be used for SDR transmission. Currently, it implements GPS L1 C/A signals, with plans to add support for other systems like BeiDou in the future.

groups.name: All Code
groups.system_prompt: This group contains all the code files in the project. Use this when you need a comprehensive overview of the entire codebase.

groups.name: Core Modules
groups.system_prompt: This group contains the core modules responsible for GPS signal generation algorithms and satellite data calculations.

groups.name: Signal Generation
groups.system_prompt: This group focuses on the signal generation components that create the actual GPS signals.

groups.name: Data Parsing
groups.system_prompt: This group contains modules for parsing various input formats like RINEX navigation files and NMEA GGA streams.

groups.name: Geometry and Coordinates
groups.system_prompt: This group contains modules for handling coordinate systems and geometric transformations.

groups.name: Time Systems
groups.system_prompt: This group focuses on GPS time conversion and date calculations.

groups.name: CLI Application
groups.system_prompt: This group contains the command-line interface application components.

groups.name: Utility Functions
groups.system_prompt: This group contains various utility functions used throughout the project.

groups.name: Constants and Definitions
groups.system_prompt: This group contains constant values and basic type definitions used throughout the project.

groups.name: Project Documentation
groups.system_prompt: This group contains project documentation and configuration files.

groups.name: Tests
groups.system_prompt: This group contains test files for verifying the functionality of the GPS signal generator.

gpssim-cli.description: Command-line interface definition and argument parsing for the GPS simulator application.

gpssim-main.description: Main entry point for the GPS simulator application.

gpssim-utils.description: Utility functions for the GPS simulator application.

gps-channel.description: GPS channel implementation for signal generation and processing.

constants-constants.description: Constants used throughout the GPS signal generation process.

gps-datetime.description: GPS time and date conversion utilities.

gps-delay-ionospheric.description: Ionospheric delay modeling for GPS signal propagation.

gps-delay.description: Signal delay modeling for GPS signal propagation.

gps-ephemeris.description: GPS ephemeris data structures and calculations.

geometry-coordinates.description: Coordinate system representations and conversions (ECEF, LLH, etc.).

geometry-transformation.description: Geometric transformations between different coordinate systems.

geometry-geometry.description: Core geometry module that defines the main geometry types and functions.

geometry-traits.description: Trait definitions for geometry types and operations.

gps-gps.description: Core GPS functionality and data structures.

gps-ionoutc.description: Ionospheric and UTC parameters for GPS signal calculations.

gps-signal-builder.description: Builder pattern implementation for GPS signal generation.

gps-generator.description: Core signal generation functionality for GPS L1 C/A signals.

gps-generator-utils.description: Utility functions for GPS signal generation.

gps-generator-mod.description: Module definition for the generator components.

parsing-nmea.description: Parser for NMEA GGA streams for dynamic position input.

parsing-user-motion.description: Parser for user motion files in ECEF and LLH formats.

parsing-mod.description: Module definition for the parsing components.

rinex-ephemeris.description: RINEX navigation file parser for GPS ephemerides.

rinex-ephemeris-orbit.description: Orbit calculations for RINEX ephemeris data.

rinex-rule.description: Rules for parsing RINEX navigation files.

rinex-mod.description: Module definition for the RINEX components.

rinex-utc.description: UTC time handling for RINEX data.

gps-table.description: Lookup tables and mathematical functions for GPS calculations.

gps-tests-prepare.description: Test preparation utilities for GPS tests.

gps-tests-generator.description: Tests for the GPS signal generator functionality.

readme.description: Project documentation including features, installation instructions, and usage examples.

project-cargo.description: Main Cargo configuration file for the workspace.
